channel.title: Central Michigan Real Estate Mentoring Podcast with Mary Peacock
channel.description: Looking for more ways to grow your real estate business and increase your income? Mary Peacock, founder of Peacock Real Estate, shares her success stories and strategies to help you on your path to a successful real estate career. For even more information and tips, go to MidMichiganRealEstateCareers.com, and follow her mentoring Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/midmichiganrealestatecareers. Ready to take your career to the next level? Peacock Real Estate provides exceptional training and mentoring to help your real estate business thrive! Call 231-856-4456 for more information!

item.title: A Few Tips for Staying in Touch With Your Database
item.author: Mary Peacock
item.description:
Today I want to talk to you about staying in touch with your database.
I haven’t done a great job at keeping up with my database in the past. I’ll be the first to admit that. However, here’s what I’ve done to improve that since.
I make sure that I send my database something of value to them on a regular basis. I send out videos twice a month that give real estate tips for buyers, sellers, and everyone in between. I also hold client events three times per year and make sure to invite everyone in the database. A lot of our clients really enjoy these events.
“My database always appreciates knowing what the market is doing.”
Finally, I send out market reports once a month to my database. They always appreciate knowing what the market is doing and what the current equity in their home looks like.
If you have any questions for me or want any more tips, don’t hesitate to give me a call or send me an email. I look forward to hearing from you soon.
item.itunes:subtitle: Our database is a huge source of business for us. Here’s how we stay in touch with them.
item.itunes:author: Mary Peacock
item.itunes:summary: Our database is a huge source of business for us. Here’s how we stay in touch with them.
